__class__/handler_room.Room.description:
A strange cavern looms to the north.  The entryway is extremely wide, and
it's height is equal throughout.  It stretches at least 70 feet wide, make a
perfect rectangle.  The interior of the cavern is extremely dark, providing
little clue as to what could be inside.  To the south you can see a rather
mundane field with a very worn path.
__class__/handler_room.Room.name: The entrance of a strange cavern
